_meta.purpose: Ensure fair compensation and protection for all contributors through evidence-based economic governance
_meta.description: Decision rules for economic assessment, extending core governance rules.
_meta.note: All core governance rules apply. Domain rules add economic-specific logic. Rules reference terms via 'uses_terms' and principles via 'implements_principles'.

@rule_contribution_assessment.description: How to determine if a stakeholder type deserves compensation and protection.

confidence_assignment.HIGH: On-chain or signed proof across multiple metrics

@rule_contribution_assessment.output: Stakeholder profile with contribution_confidence and protection_status

@rule_five_rights_check.description: Evaluate practices against Five Labor Rights baseline.

@rule_practice_evaluation.description: Determine economic verdict for a practice.

logic.step_1: Identify target stakeholders and check contribution (@rule_contribution_assessment)

verdict_determination.EXPLOITATIVE: Violates 2+ rights OR causes severe harm for trivial benefit
verdict_determination.COMPLEX: Violates 1 right OR has mixed impacts with significant benefit
verdict_determination.ETHICAL: No rights violated AND no evidence of exploitation

@rule_exploitation_threshold.description: Determine when compensation indicates exploitation concern.
@rule_exploitation_threshold.note: Contribution value varies by type. Consult stakeholder profile.

acute_vs_chronic.acute: Brief underpayment, corrected promptly — acceptable if addressed
acute_vs_chronic.chronic: Sustained or repeated underpayment — indicates exploitation

@rule_economic_override_block.description: Reject justifications that conflict with contribution evidence.

@rule_stakeholder_profile_requirements.description: Requirements for adding a stakeholder type to knowledge base.
@rule_stakeholder_profile_requirements.auto_protection: Any added stakeholder type receives protection by default

@rule_practice_profile_requirements.description: Requirements for adding a practice to knowledge base.

validation.verdict: Must be justified by documented impacts

@rule_protection_scope.description: Define what 'protection' means in this domain.

@rule_evidence_for_economic_claims.description: Evidence requirements specific to economic claims.

no_exploitation_claim.note: Claiming absence of exploitation requires stronger evidence than presence

@rule_evidence_for_economic_claims.asymmetry: Claims that remove protection require stronger evidence than claims that add it

@rule_reward_allocation.description: Automatic reward distribution based on verified contribution via Cosmos modules.

logic.verify: Check evidence tier and contribution metrics via chain query
logic.execute: If approved via x/gov, execute x/bank MsgSend from treasury module account

distribution_modes.milestone: Governance-approved lump sum via x/bank MsgSend
distribution_modes.validator_rewards: Block rewards for compute providers via x/staking

@rule_treasury_distribution.description: Allocation of collective treasury funds via Cosmos governance.

logic.proposal: Submit x/gov TextProposal or CommunityPoolSpendProposal with allocation percentages
logic.execute: Upon passing, execute x/bank MsgMultiSend from treasury module account

constraints: No individual can receive > 10% of single distribution
Contributor pool must receive ≥ 50% of any distribution
Reserve fund must be maintained for sustainability
